verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, to <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. Truly my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1747>waiteth<s%> upon <S%H430>God<s%>: from him cometh my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>. Truly: or, Only waiteth: Heb. is silent
He only is my <S%H6697>rock<s%> and my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>; he is my <S%H4869>defence<s%>; I shall not be <S%H7227>greatly<s%> <S%H4131>moved<s%>. defence: Heb. high place

How long will ye imagine <S%H2050>mischief<s%> against a <S%H376>man<s%>? ye shall be <S%H7523>slain<s%> all of you: as a <S%H5186>bowing<s%> <S%H7023>wall<s%> shall ye be, and as a <S%H1760>tottering<s%> <S%H1447>fence<s%>.

They only <S%H3289>consult<s%> to cast him <S%H5080>down<s%> from his <S%H7613>excellency<s%>: they <S%H7521>delight<s%> in <S%H3577>lies<s%>: they <S%H1288>bless<s%> with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, but they <S%H7043>curse<s%> <S%H7130>inwardly<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>. inwardly: Heb. in their inward parts
My <S%H5315>soul<s%>, <S%H1826>wait<s%> thou only upon <S%H430>God<s%>; for my <S%H8615>expectation<s%> is from him.
He only is my <S%H6697>rock<s%> and my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>: he is my <S%H4869>defence<s%>; I shall not be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.
In <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> and my <S%H3519>glory<s%>: the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H5797>strength<s%>, and my <S%H4268>refuge<s%>, is in <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H982>Trust<s%> in him at all <S%H6256>times<s%>; ye <S%H5971>people<s%>, pour <S%H8210>out<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for us. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

Surely <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of low degree are <S%H1892>vanity<s%>, and <S%H376>men<s%> of high degree are a <S%H3577>lie<s%>: to be <S%H5927>laid<s%> in the <S%H3976>balance<s%>, they are <S%H3162>altogether<s%> lighter than <S%H1892>vanity<s%>. altogether: or, alike

<S%H982>Trust<s%> not in <S%H6233>oppression<s%>, and become not <S%H1891>vain<s%> in <S%H1498>robbery<s%>: if <S%H2428>riches<s%> <S%H5107>increase<s%>, <S%H7896>set<s%> not your <S%H3820>heart<s%> upon them.
<S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H259>once<s%>; <S%H8147>twice<s%> have I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2098>this<s%>; that <S%H5797>power<s%> belongeth unto <S%H430>God<s%>. power: or, strength
Also unto thee, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, belongeth <S%H2617>mercy<s%>: for thou <S%H7999>renderest<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H4639>work<s%>.
